# AccelerateBuffer

**Protocol**

A type that represents an immutable buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol AccelerateBuffer<Element>
```

## Overview

If you implement your own type that conforms to [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/AccelerateBuffer] and uses the default implementation of [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/AccelerateBuffer/withUnsafeBufferPointer(_:)], your type needs to return a nonnil result from [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/Sequence/withContiguousStorageIfAvailable(_:)-4don7].

## Associated Types

- **Element**: The buffer’s element type.

## Instance Properties

- **count**: The number of elements in the buffer.

## Instance Methods

- **withUnsafeBufferPointer(_:)**: Calls a closure with a pointer to the object’s contiguous storage.

## Essentials

- **AccelerateMutableBuffer**: A type that represents a mutable buffer.
- **AccelerateMatrixBuffer**
- **AccelerateMutableMatrixBuffer**
- **AccelerateMatrixOrder**

## Inherited By

- AccelerateMutableBuffer

## Conforming Types

- vImage.PixelBuffer
